segments.text: Good morning , madam . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , madam . What kind of coffee do you want to have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . We have espresso , latte , skinny latte , fancy coffee and Americano .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll have a latte , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Wait a minute , please . And the sugar is right over there .
segments.speaker: S1
